fields.description:
After updateing to Appcelerator Studio 4.1.0 following problem occurs, even after closing and opening several times.

Alert: "Loading Platform Contents" has encountered a problem.
An internal error occurred during: "Loading Platform Contents".
java.lang.NullPointerException

tiapp.xml shows up, but can not be saved.
fields.summary: Appcelerator Studio Update to 4.1.0 causes problems
